metadata.description: Create new or use an existing Log Analytic Workspace
Specify the Azure Region for your new or existing OMS workspace
Specify the SKU for Log Analytics
Specify the Azure VM Inventory retrieval frequency
The base URI where artifacts required by this template are located
The sasToken required to access _artifactsLocation.  When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a sasToken will be automatically generated.

customSolution.name: Azure VM Inventory
customSolution.description: Monitor Azure VMs deployed across subscriptions
customSolution.author: volkanc@microsoft.com

variables.opsInsightWorkspaceKeyDescription: Encrypted value of the user's omsWorkspaceKey
variables.createScheduleAutomationAccountDescripti: The name of the Automation Account
variables.createScheduleResourceGroupDescription: The name of the resource group

alertArray.description: Azure VMs which shutdown from within operating system  will continue incurring charges. Stop the VM from the portal to prevent unnecessary consumption.
alertArray.query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory Status_s=Stopped | measure countdistinct(ID_s) by AzureSubscription_s,VmName_s

alertArray.description: Each Azure Subscription has quotas for VM cores per region. If the quota is reached new VMs annot be created
alertArray.query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats   | EXTEND div(product(currentValue_d,100),limit_d) as UsedPct | Measure Max(UsedPct) by Location_s,Usagemetric_s | where AggregatedValue >90
alertArray.alertName: Azure Quota Usage Reached  90% of the Subscription Quota

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory  | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by HWProfile_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory  | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by HWProfile_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Location_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Location_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by DeploymentType_s

LineChart.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory  | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by Status_s interval ', parameters('omsDataIngestionFrequency'),'Minutes')]

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMInventory Status_s=Running |  measure countdistinct(VmName_s)  by  HWProfile_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNIC | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by subnet_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNIC | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by AzureSubscription_s,subnet_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMEndpoint | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by endpointName_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMEndpoint | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by endpointName_s,privatePort_d

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNSGrule | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by RuleName_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNSGrule | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by RuleName_s

Donut.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNSGrule  access_s=Allow  | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by destinationPortRange_s

List.Query: Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=VMNSGrule  access_s=Allow  | measure countdistinct(VmName_s) by sourcePortRange_s,destinationPortRange_s,protocol_s

Donut.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats TimeGenerated>NOW-', parameters('omsDataIngestionFrequency'),'Minutes  Usagemetric_s=cores |measure max(currentValue_d) by Location_s')]

List.Query: [concat('Type=AzureVMInventory_CL MetricName_s=ARMVMUsageStats TimeGenerated>NOW-', parameters('omsDataIngestionFrequency'),'Minutes  Usagemetric_s=cores |measure max(currentValue_d) by AzureSubscription_s,Location_s')]
